compliance.title: Compliance is not a slide at the end. It's the engine.
compliance.subtitle: Different countries, different rules for telemarketing, recording and AI disclosure. We structure them so you can actually use them in campaigns.
compliance.rules: For each: basic rules on marketing calls, recording, quiet hours, DNC registries, disclosure requirements
compliance.versioned: Updated and versioned, so you always know "where the campaign rules come from"

example.title: Example: Germany
example.outboundMarketing: Outbound marketing: Allowed B2B with consent
example.quietHours: Quiet hours: No calls after 20:00, weekend blocked

quietHours.title: Quiet Hours
quietHours.description: No calls outside permitted hours: the platform knows when to avoid disturbing (e.g., no calls after 20:00 if prohibited in that country).

dncConsent.title: DNC & Consent
dncConsent.description: Automatic cross-checking with Do-Not-Call registries where applicable, and opt-in/opt-out contact management.

aiDisclosure.title: AI Disclosure
aiDisclosure.description: The agent informs the caller that it's a virtual assistant if local law requires it (e.g., "This call is automated").

privacySecurity.title: Privacy & Data Security
privacySecurity.description: Encrypted voice data and transcripts, EU hosting GDPR-compliant, automatic deletion options after X days.

compliance.countriesSubtitle: Every call automatically respects local regulations
compliance.countriesMore: And more countries added. If your target market is not on the list,

languagesVoices.title: 30+ languages, tuned for work ‚Äî not small talk.
languagesVoices.subtitle: From a dentist in Rome reminding patients in Romanian, to a factory in Germany calling distributors in Spanish.
languagesVoices.voicesDesigned: Voices designed to understand and pronounce names, addresses, numbers, product codes
languagesVoices.ttsPremium: Ability to use premium TTS voices (like ElevenLabs / similar)
languagesVoices.toneControl: Tone control: more "front office", more "back office", etc.

whyAgoralia.title: Why Choose Agoralia
whyAgoralia.subtitle: The most advanced AI platform for cross-border call automation, designed to grow with your international business.

multilingual.title: Native Multilingual
multilingual.description: Speak your customers' language: virtual agents fluent in over 150 languages and dialects for AI agents, with 100+ languages supported in the interface.

compliance.title: Automatic Compliance
compliance.description: No more legal risks: every call respects privacy and local regulations (GDPR, TCPA, LGPD, PDPA and over 15 regulatory frameworks).

scalability.title: 24/7 Scalability
scalability.description: Don't limit your sales: AI handles thousands of calls simultaneously, at any time, without ever getting tired.

howItWorks.title: How Agoralia Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Automate your entire outbound sales process in minutes. From contact list to measurable results.

step1.title: Import or integrate your contacts
step1.description: Connect your CRM or upload a list: Agoralia automatically identifies who to call, when and where, respecting time zones and language preferences.

step2.title: AI calls for you
step2.description: A virtual agent contacts each lead in their native language, following an intelligent script that adapts to responses in real-time and handles objections.

step3.title: Receive results and data
step3.description: Every conversation is transcribed, analyzed and saved automatically. You get qualified leads, scheduled appointments and detailed insights in your CRM.

completeSolution.title: A unique platform to manage global voice sales
completeSolution.subtitle: Agoralia combines conversational AI, international telephony and business integrations into a single plug & play solution. Everything you need to scale cross-border sales.

voice.title: Natural AI voice in every language
voice.description: GPT-4 and advanced speech models for human and fluent conversations in 150+ languages.

integrations.title: Ready integrations with your systems
integrations.description: CRM, calendars and APIs for seamless workflows. HubSpot, Salesforce, Outlook and more.

dashboard.title: Real-time dashboard with transcriptions and KPIs
dashboard.description: Complete analytics, sentiment analysis and automatic reports to optimize performance.

security.title: Built-in security and compliance controls
security.description: GDPR, TCPA and over 15 regulatory frameworks managed automatically for every call.

whyDifferent.title: Not another toy demo.
whyDifferent.subtitle: Agoralia is built for real calls: money, appointments, orders, renewals.

understands.title: Understands how people actually speak
understands.description: Handles different accents, corrections, "wait a moment", codes, numbers, addresses. It's not a button-based IVR, it's a real conversation.

playsNice.title: Plays nice with your stack
playsNice.description: Writes to CRM, updates fields, adds notes, creates tasks, can also book appointments in connected calendars (Cal.com / Google, etc.).

designedRules.title: Designed around rules, not vibes
designedRules.description: Calling hours, consent, recording, what can be said and what cannot: everything configurable by country and by campaign.

proof.title: Real results
proof.subtitle: From Italy to UAE: See how companies scale globally with Agoralia

caseStudies.metric: Quote generation time reduced from 2 days to 4 hours
caseStudies.description: Automated quote requests in 12 languages across EU and MENA markets.

caseStudies.metric: From 50 to 220 qualified leads per month
caseStudies.description: 24/7 inbound support in Arabic and English. Never miss a call.
Automated compliance checks for all outbound calls across 28 EU countries.
AI coaching and quality scoring increased conversion rates significantly.
LGPD-compliant voice AI handling Portuguese and Spanish calls 24/7.
Launched in 15 APAC markets simultaneously with native voice support.
Post-delivery NPS calls in French, English, and Arabic improved retention.
Automated TCPA compliance for outbound campaigns across all 50 states.

calculator.title: Cost Calculator
calculator.description: Estimate your monthly costs based on usage

q1.question: Can I change plans anytime?
q1.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately.

q2.question: What happens if I exceed my plan limits?
q2.answer: Additional usage is charged at the per-minute rate for your plan. We'll notify you before charges apply.

q3.question: Is there a setup fee?
q3.answer: No setup fees. You only pay for what you use based on your chosen plan.

q4.question: Do you offer volume discounts?
q4.answer: Yes, we offer volume discounts for high-usage customers. Contact our sales team for custom pricing.

q5.question: What payment methods do you accept?
q5.answer: We accept all major credit cards, bank transfers, and can invoice for annual plans.
